languages.text: Дознаватель ван Калокс направился в монастырь Адептус Механикус, оберегающего священный археотех-реактор. Согласно донесению губернатора, в его окрестностях были замечены группы мятежников. Для обнаружения сотрудника Инквизиции и инспекции безопасности монастыря Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано направиться в данный регион.

Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.
languages.original_text: Дознаватель ван Калокс направился в монастырь Адептус Механикус, оберегающего священный археотех-реактор. Согласно донесению губернатора, в его окрестностях были замечены группы мятежников. Для обнаружения сотрудника Инквизиции и инспекции безопасности монастыря Вольному Торговцу рекомендовано направиться в данный регион.

traits.locale_text: Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

languages.text: Interrogator van Calox begab sich zum Kloster des Adeptus Mechanicus, das den heiligen Archäotech-Reaktor bewacht. Laut Gouverneur Medineh wurden in der Nähe Rebellentruppen gesichtet. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss die Lage in der Region einschätzen und den Agenten der Inquisition finden.
languages.original_text: Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

traits.locale_text: Interrogator van Calox begab sich zum Kloster des Adeptus Mechanicus, das den heiligen Archäotech-Reaktor bewacht. Laut Gouverneur Medineh wurden in der Nähe Rebellentruppen gesichtet. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} muss die Lage in der Region einschätzen und den Agenten der Inquisition finden.

languages.text: L'interrogateur van Calox s'est rendu au monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus qui garde le réacteur archéotechnologique sacré. D'après le gouverneur Medineh, des troupes rebelles ont été repérées dans les environs. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit se rendre dans la région pour évaluer la situation et trouver l'agent de l'Inquisition.
languages.original_text: Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

traits.locale_text: L'interrogateur van Calox s'est rendu au monastère de l'Adeptus Mechanicus qui garde le réacteur archéotechnologique sacré. D'après le gouverneur Medineh, des troupes rebelles ont été repérées dans les environs. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} doit se rendre dans la région pour évaluer la situation et trouver l'agent de l'Inquisition.

languages.text: 冯·卡洛克斯审讯官去了机械修会的修道院，神圣的远古科技反应堆就安置在那个地方。据梅迪涅总督报告，那片地区附近发现了叛军的身影。行商浪人需要前往该地区评估形势，并找到审判庭的代理人。
languages.original_text: Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

traits.locale_text: 冯·卡洛克斯审讯官去了机械修会的修道院，神圣的远古科技反应堆就安置在那个地方。据梅迪涅总督报告，那片地区附近发现了叛军的身影。行商浪人需要前往该地区评估形势，并找到审判庭的代理人。

languages.text: インテロゲイターのヴァン・カロックスは、神聖な技術遺産リアクターを守る帝国技術局の修道院に向かった。メディネ総督によると、反乱軍が付近で目撃されているという。自由開拓者は状況を把握し、異端審問庁の諜報員を見つけるために、現地へ向かう必要がある。
languages.original_text: Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

traits.locale_text: インテロゲイターのヴァン・カロックスは、神聖な技術遺産リアクターを守る帝国技術局の修道院に向かった。メディネ総督によると、反乱軍が付近で目撃されているという。自由開拓者は状況を把握し、異端審問庁の諜報員を見つけるために、現地へ向かう必要がある。

languages.text: El Interrogador van Calox ha acudido al monasterio del Adeptus Mechanicus que protege el sagrado reactor de arqueotecnología. Según el gobernador Medineh, las fuerzas rebeldes están por la zona. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe acudir a la región para evaluar la situación y encontrar al agente de la Inquisición.
languages.original_text: Interrogator van Calox headed to the monastery of the Adeptus Mechanicus that guards the sacred archeotech reactor. According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.

traits.locale_text: El Interrogator van Calox ha acudido al monasterio del Adeptus Mechanicus que protege el sagrado reactor de arqueotecnología. Según el gobernador Medineh, las fuerzas rebeldes están por la zona. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debe acudir a la región para evaluar la situación y encontrar al agente de la Inquisición.

languages.text: Sorgucu van Calox, kutsal arkeotek reaktörünü koruyan Adeptus Mechanicus manastırına gitmiş. Vali Medineh, o civarda asi kuvvetlerinin görüldüğünü belirtti. Hür Tacir'in, bölgeye giderek durumu değerlendirmesi ve Engizisyon vekilinin yerini tespit etmesi gerekiyor.

According to Governor Medineh, rebel forces have been spotted in the vicinity. The Rogue Trader needs to head to the region to assess the situation and locate the agent of the Inquisition.
